title: Understanding Cultural Influences on Collaborative Learning: Strengthening Global Leadership Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic organizational management skills and multicultural team leadership experience
context.additional_context: Corporate managers/leaders with diverse cultural backgrounds learn to design collaborative learning strategies in mobile-accessible microlearning environments, with activities executable in BYOD settings

learning_goals: Learners can analyze learning preferences of team members with diverse cultural backgrounds.
Learners can design three or more collaborative learning strategies considering cultural differences.
Learners can plan and operate collaborative learning activities executable in mobile environments.

resources: Comparative materials on cultural learning styles

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
